Breeding male.description: Male Blue-winged Teal have a white crescent on the face that Cinnamon Teal lack and a dark (not cinnamon) head.

Female/nonbreeding male.description: Female Blue-winged Teal have a more heavily patterned face and body with with a stronger eyeline. Also note the white patch at the base of the bill on Blue-winged Teals but not on female Cinnamon Teals. Blue-wings also have a slightly smaller bill.

Breeding male.description: Northern Shovelers are larger than Cinnamon Teal with a white (not cinnamon) breast.

Female/immature.description: Northern Shovelers are larger with a bigger orange bill than Cinnamon Teal. The face is darker and more streaked than female/nonbreeding Cinnamon Teal.

Breeding male and female (American).description: Green-winged Teal are smaller than Cinnamon Teal with a green speculum (wing patch) and no blue in the forewing.

Female.description: Green-winged Teal are smaller and have a smaller bill than Cinnamon Teal.

Breeding male.description: Ruddy Ducks have a large white face patch that Cinnamon Teals lack. Breeding male Ruddies have a bright-blue bill.
